Articles.Content: The Saturn V parts from my Apollo pack (check my signature) are in .dae format. It turns out that in 0.20 .dae makes the part go all grey. I am trying to convert it to .mu, but don't know how to. Could someone PLEASE tell me?

The stickied threads in the modelling forum would be a good place to start:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25482-TUTORIAL-Getting-Started-With-Unity-BACK-FROM-THE-DEAD!
